Title: Assassin's Creed
Writer: Michael Lesslie, Adam Cooper, Bill Collage
Actors: Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons
Plot: Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society.
Country: United States, France, United Kingdom, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Malta, Spain, Canada
